Modules¶

This document contains all the inline documentation for modules in the NanoStream package.

File Handler (nanostream_file_handler)¶

This module contains the classes for reading and writing files.

Classes that can be instantiated in a NanoStreamGraph to read and write files.

class nanostream.nanostream_file_handler.FileReader(input_queue=None, output_queue=None)[source]¶

Reads a file and passes its contents down the pipeline.

process_item(item)[source]¶

Reads a file into memory.

Parameters:item (str) – Filename
class nanostream.nanostream_file_handler.FileWriter(path=None)[source]¶

Writes the message to a file with a random name in a specified directory.

__init__(path=None)[source]¶

Initializer.

Parameters:path (str) – Directory path for the file.
process_item(item)[source]¶

Writes the file to the self.path directory, with a random filename generated by the random_hash function.

nanostream.nanostream_file_handler.random_hash(seed=None)[source]¶

Returns a random hash; usually for naming files uniquely.
